properties.name: info.pmarquezh.junjo.numericPattern
properties.description: Describes, as a REGEX, the format of the numeric pattern to be substituted, if it exists, in the creation of a new element in a sequence. The goal is to detect strings wit formats similar to: '{NNN}', '{NNNNNN}', where the 'N' represents a digit in an arbitrary number of digits in the number to be generated. Examples: 1529, 000475, 0001.

properties.name: info.pmarquezh.junjo.alphaPattern
properties.description: Describes, as a REGEX, the format of the alpha pattern to be substituted, if it exists, in the creation of a new element in a sequence. The goal is to detect strings wit formats similar to: '{AA}', '{AAAAA}', where the 'A' represents an alphabetic letter in the range 'A-Z' in an arbitrary number of characters for the string to be generated. Examples: AAA, AAB, AAC, ARDSGY.
